@htctouch: Why, does it make less "awsm"? Movie has decent IMDb rating, regarding how new it is DVD... and quite stupid sounds complaints "is so hard to watch and read in same time"... LOL, IMO even more stupid thing is to dub voices in domestic languages.

Few of the best movies I've ever seen have been non-English, and even if they weren't - have been already subtitled by movie-distributors. In short - I don't mind and I do not notice. However, I found enormously stupid some Polish voice-dubs, where ONE single GUY (in male voice, of course) read the lines of Michelle Pfeiffer... ROFL.
